overview: When Fran met Ashour through a dating app, he never imagined the story of the 34-year-old Iranian. After the meeting, a forgotten passport catches the attention of Fran and his friend Juan, who decide to investigate Ashour's past. Through the creation of a documentary, they both discover the odyssey that Ashour has lived to achieve his freedom.
title: Ashurbanipal, historia de un encuentro
